Text: Openwork reported a 18.3 per cent increase in pre-tax profits to £22.6m for 2018, its seventh year of profit growth allowing the network to pay its first dividend to shareholders totalling £2m.
Cause: Openwork reported a 18.3 per cent increase in pre-tax profits to £22.6m for 2018, its seventh year of profit growth
Effect: pay its first dividend to shareholders totalling £2m.
Sentence: <e1>Openwork reported a 18.3 per cent increase in pre-tax profits to £22.6m for 2018, its seventh year of profit growth</e1> allowing the network to <e2>pay its first dividend to shareholders totalling £2m.</e2>
